title: Accelerator Device Section
description: Settings for control accelerator device, including GPUs, defined in files under include/accelerator_device

parallel_method.description: Path to lparallelmethod.txt, defining the parallelisation technique for each algorithm

sync_host.description: Path to lsynchost.txt, defining optional additional device-to-host memory transfers

select_gpu.description: Path to select_gpu, used to perform the binding between GPUs and CPUs
